name: accessibilityAdjustableAction(_:)
desc: Adds an accessibility adjustable action to the view. Actions allow assistive technologies, such as the VoiceOver, to interact with the view by invoking the action.
declaration: func accessibilityAdjustableAction(_ handler: @escaping (AccessibilityAdjustmentDirection) -> Void) -> ModifiedContent<Self, AccessibilityAttachmentModifier>
